hotels.title: San Juan Beachfront Opulence with Four Pools & Wellness Spa
hotels.description: This opulent Puerto Rican resort has been a beachfront gem since 1958, occupying a glittering location in the heart of the Parque Isla Verde. This haven boasts four pools, a state-of-the-art fitness centre, swim-up bar, casino and night club. Here, you'll find a selection of exquisite dining options, including the Meat Market, a modern steakhouse offering prime cuts and fresh seafood. Spend your days exploring the heritage Old San Juan, with its colourful Spanish colonial buildings and ancient fortresses, or swim in the ocean at the nearby Playa Isla Verde. After a long day of exploring, retreat to the hotel's exquisite wellness spa to rest and rejuvenate.
